description.narrative: This project aims at contributing to the confidence building process through the preservation of Cypriot cultural heritage island wide according to the strategy of the Technical Committee on Cultural Heritage.

title.narrative: Activity web page
Annual Output Results
Output Indicator

description.narrative: - 2 cultural heritage sites to benefit from emergency measures - 8 sites to benefit from conservation designs and/or conservation works

comment.narrative: Study of Cultural Heritage Support to cultural heritage monuments of great importance for Cyprus - Phase 1 List of sites identified by the strategy note of the Technical Committee on Cultural Heritage

T1- Bi-communal monitoring visits to project sites organised and facilitated regularly (at least one per month) T2 - Conservation works completed in at least 2 cultural heritage sites T3 - Tendering process completed for conservation works at Agios Panteleimonas Monastery

T1- Achieved: One bi-communal monitoring visits/month organised T2 - Achieved: Conservation works completed in Agios Afksentios Church (May 2015), Old St.George Church (14 November 2015), Watermill/Aqueduct in Chrysochou/Hirsofu (Expected completion date: December 2015) T3 - Tendering process completed for conservation works at Agios Panteleimonas Monastery.

title.narrative: Restoration of the Holy Monastery of Apostolos Andreas

description.narrative: The restoration of this very important religious monument intends to contribute to the on-going confidence-building process between the Greek Cypriots and Turkish Cypriots communities within the context of cultural heritage preservation and protection.
